doc: Describes whether a is being used to open existing files or to save to a possibly new file.

members.doc: Indicates open mode. The file chooser will only let the user pick an existing file.
members.name: open

members.doc: Indicates save mode. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing file, or type in a new filename.
members.name: save

members.doc: Indicates an Open mode for selecting folders. The file chooser will let the user pick an existing folder.
members.name: select_folder

members.doc: Indicates a mode for creating a new folder. The file chooser will let the user name an existing or new folder.
members.name: create_folder

name: FileChooserAction
